Elements.Name: multiplier
Description: Global multiplier for Pop-In that includes most objects.

Elements.Name: enemyMultiplier
Description: Enemy multiplier for pop-in (enemies are not affected by the Global Multiplier).

Elements.Name: collectibleMultiplier
Description: Collectible multiplier for pop-in (collectibles are not affected by the Global Multiplier).

Elements.Name: stabilityMode
Description: Limits the total range of lower-range objects so that the game doesn't crash when loading an island, but some objects will visibly show less range than before. It's highly recommended to keep this on.

Elements.Name: camTrigger
Description: Removes (most) Camera Triggers from the open zones.

Elements.Name: dashPanels
Description: Removes Dash Panels and Rail Boosters from the open zones.

Elements.Name: 2D
Description: Removes all 2D dimensions from the open zones, letting you play as much of the game in 3D as possible.

Elements.Name: springHoming
Description: Forces springs to be targeted by homing attacks, this does not affect classic springs.
